title: Andy & Blessing's Horrific Resident Evil 8 Playthrough (Part 3)
description: After weeks away we got Andy back for another entry into his playthrough of Resident Evil 8. Bless and Mike are in for the ride as Andy completes another part of the game venturing into the dam area to collect another piece of the key and Rose!
